Articles.Content: I just completed a fresh install of 1.3.1 and I can't seem to save my ships? I built a simple one, gave it a description ("Ship1") and the "Save" button is available (not greyed out). I click the Save button but "Ship1" does not show up in my list of ships when I click the "Open" button. I have been away from KSP for over a year but I can't believe I've forgotten how to do this simple thing, LOL!
There are two text boxes, you know -- the ship name and the ship description. It's the ship name you need to change -- you said you changed the description. Description won't work.

Just now, bewing said:

There are two text boxes, you know -- the ship name and the ship description. It's the ship name you need to change -- you said you changed the description. Description won't work.

 

I'm an idiot, LOL! Thanks buddy.
